title: Part 523 - Rules of the Court of Appeals For The Temporary Practice of Law in New York
content:
Part 523 - Rules of the Court of Appeals For The Temporary Practice of Law in New York

State Regulations
§ 523.1 - General regulation as to lawyers admitted in another jurisdiction
§ 523.2 - Scope of temporary practice
§ 523.3 - Disciplinary authority
§ 523.4 - Annual report
§ 523.5 - Working from home

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
